comment: I think this is the last lecture by Dr Kempthorne and I would just like to thank him for everything he has taught. He is a wonderful teacher who had to cover some really complex topics. Thank you so much sir, forever indebted to you.
7:22 Conditionalmodel..Unconditionalmmodels
An observation: Videos like this have no more than 75k views and other videos with no information,  receive thousands of millions of views.
Thank you, Sir! Very useful.
Thank you, Sir! Very useful!
one of the best online quant finance course i've ever seen  Thanks
Slides : https://ocw.mit.edu/courses/18-s096-topics-in-mathematics-with-applications-in-finance-fall-2013/3c8e688538b350a73a8c1cd46056fc5a_MIT18_S096F13_lecnote15.pdf

This is wonderful content. I’m surprised by all the negativity in the comments. It’s not simple stuff he’s explaining. Pause, take a breather, and think about it if you need to. But don’t criticize a guy giving a good lecture on a complex topic. It’s not like this is an English class examining the rhyming patterns in a Dr Zus book.
Say uuuuhhh one more time. Come on man. Don’t they teach public speaking at MIT?
The lecturer needs to pay more attention to the essence and explanation on the board
many formulas are not enough to the point
A very good instructor and good slides. Thank you MIT from Tunisia.
People complain so much, MIT is doing a effort putting this lectures on Youtube. I think the quality of the video and the teacher are good. Thanks for the lecture, really helpful at least for me.
For those who say he is a poor teacher, I would rather question your intelligence, for intuitions don't exist without precise mathematics.
This guy is a poor teacher ..
Thank you for putting these lectures online. They are very helpful.
excellent if you cannot go to sleep
horrible teacher...all these could've been decomposed and explained more intuitively

Thank You. In one semester, or 24 sessions THE WHOLE IVERVIEW IS THERE. It is incumbent upon us to fill the gaps. I think this course will change my life. I know which papers to read, and what exactly becoming a quant is all about
First, HE IS NOT A TEACHER. HE IS A PROFESSOR. HE DEALS WITH ADULTS THAT ARE SOPHISTICATED ENOUGH IN MATHEMATICS. For those wanting it "Barney Style", this is not the venue. HE IS AMAZING!!!

@EduardoGarcia-if2kv  Regardless of whether you're sophisticated in mathematics, if you can't explain things simply and intuitively you probably aren't a great teacher; what he is explaining is not very complicated, but he makes it seem so
@chrisdavies616  What part about he is not a teacher, is not clear to you?

@EduardoGarcia-if2kv  of course he's a teacher, what a ridiculous thing to say; part of a university professor's role is teaching students (you can see this in the video where he is teaching students)
I bet there is a better way of presenting these concepts and ideas to make it more palatable to the average person.
@eriangelino7800  part of teaching is knowing your audience. You are obviously not the intended target. you should open your mind and pause the video to research what you do not understand
@EduardoGarcia-if2kv  don't know why you're so upset about a professor that cannot teach.
Ggf
